messages.title: Your Choice at This Election
messages.content: Strong, Stable Leadership in the National Interest or a Coalition of Chaos with Jeremy Corbyn

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success by securing the best deal for Britain and negotiating strongly.
Building a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creating secure and well-paid jobs across the country.
Providing real opportunity and support for all with a special place for the NHS in the candidate's vision for the country.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success, the UK's Article 50 Letter to the President of the European Council, repealing the European Communities Act 1972.
issues.economy: Building a stronger economy, creating secure and well-paid jobs.
issues.health: Providing real opportunity and support for all with special emphasis on the NHS.

community.content: Supporting public services, schools, businesses, community initiatives, and being a strong voice for local people.

examples: Shock Win: President Trump stunning Trump Win.
Shock Win: Brexit: Europe stunned by UK leave vote.
Strong, stable leadership in the national interest.
A coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.
Theresa May provides the leadership the United Kingdom needs at this critical time.
Working hard all year round through local engagement with various visits to schools, businesses, and charities.
